channel.title: Win32 on A Square Dozen
channel.description: Recent content in Win32 on A Square Dozen

item.title: Troubleshooting Win32 App Installs in Intune
item.description: As you may know, Steven Hosking and I recently started a YouTube channel called Intune.Training where we are walking through how to get started with Microsoft Intune each week. As we were recording our latest episode (coming soon) on Win32 applications, the demo failed when we attempted to install the application we had just built in Intune. We didn’t have time in the video to go through troubleshooting the issue, but I later determined the issue.
